original_text: And the Philistines stood on a mountain on the one side, and Israel stood on a mountain on the other side: and there was a valley between them.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들은 이쪽 산에 섰고 이스라엘은 저쪽 산에 섰고 그 사이에는 골짜기가 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And the Philistines stood on a mountain on the one side
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 블레셋 사람들은 한쪽 산에 서 있었고

sentences.original_text: and Israel stood on a mountain on the other side
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘은 다른 쪽 산에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and there was a valley between them
